actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 in order to provide that daylight saving time shall begin on the first Sunday in May and end on the last Sunday in September in each year.

summary.text: Requires, under the Uniform Time Act of 1966, that daylight saving time shall begin on the first Sunday in May and end on the last Sunday in September in each year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 in order to provide that daylight saving time shall begin on the first Sunday in May and end on the last Sunday in September in each year.
